title: Forever Blue
description: SHOULD SHE BELIEVE HER HEART..."For Lucy Tait, no one personified the word hero as much as Blue McCoy. As a child, he was her self-appointed rescuer, and as a teenager, he was the boy who hot away. Now he was back. But he was also a suspect in an unthinkable crime. . . and Lucy was the investigating officer."...OR HER HEAD?"All evidence pointed to Blue McCoy as the prime suspect, and everyone in town thought he was guilty. So, why was Lucy so convinced of his innocence? Was she swayed by the facts. . . or blinded by love
author: Suzanne Brockmann
